title: New: Sina. – From Love To Dust EP
body:
Belfast based beat maker Sina.

has a new EP entitled ‘**_from love to dust_**’, a series of 3 tracks and 3 remixes that absorb, mutter to and ultimately consume a listener.

In all honesty, **[Sina.](http://www.facebook.com/sinasounds)** isn’t necessarily doing anything abstractly different from his contemporaries, yet his work still manages to haunt. This in many ways is down to the production; it’s the records sweeping clarity of samples that makes the whole thing far more vivid than other beat-makers of our age.

Definitely one to watch. Stream the whole record below.
